data.text:
@Bob01778457 Ntm I have bad drug reactions all the time. A healthcare professional once told me I was the most drug sensitive person she'd ever met.

No, you can't inject me w some bs y'all just came up w on the fly!

@Bob01778457 I'm young & barely leave my house even preCovid, I associate almost exclusively w the same 2 households & few neighbors, I am not the super spreader & I will not be the key to herd immunity. Idk why ppl can't just leave ppl alone if they don't wanna volunteer 4 human experiments
@lovable_ish @HBabcock10 The judgements come from your refusal to help the collective whole for your comfort and advertising it on Twitter.

@CumDumpTruck @HBabcock10 You don't know my circumstances & can fuck right off w your stupid uninformed judgments about me. Tho I'm sure judging, insulting & lecturing strangers online brings you great joy & self worth. ✌ https://t.co/4fXXRFllg8

@lovable_ish @HBabcock10 Is this you assuming I'm a Democrat lmao 
You have control over your own body, but in a pandemic that has killed half a million people in just the US alone, it's not longer about JUST your body. Your decisions have consequences that affects others outside of yourself.

@CumDumpTruck @HBabcock10 Sounds like you don't respect ppls right to control their own bodies & can't even keep your bs to yourself. 🤔
https://t.co/qULHjmJ42v

@lovable_ish @HBabcock10 Sounds selfish. 
The vaccine has decades of research behind it, from the SARS vaccine. It's like it was pulled from anyone's ass.

I don't pressure or insult anyone who wants to get a vaccine; that's your decision, your risk. Stop thinking me NOT getting a vaccine is any of your business. You have no right to talk to me about what I do or do not put in my body.
